localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit

blogPost.title:
Interesting chart from Ark's big ideas report. 

"Roughly 60% of bitcoin’s supply had not moved in more than a year"

https://t.co/EDJEa5OY6Z https://t.co/76VC05lsg8
blogPost.author: Michael Batnick

localize.full_text:
方舟子的大思路报告中，有一张有趣的图表。

"大约60%的比特币供应量在一年多的时间里没有动过"

https://t.co/EDJEa5OY6Z

方舟子的大思路報告中，有一張有趣的圖表。

"大約60%的比特幣供應量在一年多的時間裏沒有動過"

https://t.co/EDJEa5OY6Z
